column5: Afternoon!  I would like to get some information about hut rentals on Lake Scugog.....I have found 2 options  Paul's Ice huts Lake Scugog Ice Hut Rentals   Not sure if these are the only 2 and curious if anyone has used either.  Any info would be appreciated.  Thanks, Bly
Go with Scugog Ice Huts. Kerry is a top notch guy. Tell him Joonmoon sent ya.
FOR TEN BUCKS YOU AND CLIFF SHOULD BE ABLE TO FIT INTO MY SURVIVAL SUIT NO PROBS  LOL!!!
For another 5 bucks you can use mine to keep the minnows warm.

Thanks, I will do that!    Ummm, if I were to get ccmt into the same survival suit with me, not sure that fishing would be foremost on my mind   Haven't had the pleasure of meeting you in person but from they way ppl talk....are you sure your suit is big enough??
HMMMMM ON THAT NOT I TAKE MY OFFER BACK  LOL  CAN YA PM ME AFTER YOU HAVE GONE WHICH COMPANY YOU WENT WITH AND HOW MUCH?? TX
